request.description: Setting the quantity to 0 removes an item from the cart.
Adiciona um sku para um cart existente
Adiciona um sku para um cart existente

The possible native codes for "shipping_methods"  
are as follow:

| Label | Carrier code | Method code |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DHL | dhl | Varies |
| Federal Express | fedex | Varies |
| Flat Rate | flatrate | flatrate |
| Free Shipping | freeshipping | freeshipping |
| Best Way | tablerate | bestway |
| United Parcel Service | ups | Varies |
| United States Postal Service | usps | Varies |

More info on: [https://devdocs.magento.com/guides/v2.4/graphql/mutations/set-shipping-method.html](https://devdocs.magento.com/guides/v2.4/graphql/mutations/set-shipping-method.html)

The possible native codes for "payment_method"  
are as follow:

| Title | Code |
| --- | --- |
| Bank Transfer Payment | banktransfer |
| Cash on Delivery | cashondelivery |
| Check / Money order | checkmo |
| No Payment Information Required | free |
| Purchase Order | purchaseorder |

  
More info on: [https://devdocs.magento.com/guides/v2.4/graphql/mutations/set-payment-method.html](https://devdocs.magento.com/guides/v2.4/graphql/mutations/set-payment-method.html)
